title: Superb
desc: We have stayed here 3 times now and again in February 2020. The staff are helpful the hotel clean and comfortable there are many eateries in and around the hotel, the MRT is at your doorstep to all stations . We luv it.

title: Very Good Location
desc: I love the location. The hotel room is small but we managed! Aside from the MTR being just few steps away, there a lot of food choices around the area as well as a grocery! Bus stops are also around the hotel. Neighborhood also feels safe even if we walk at night. We booked for 3 rooms and we requested to be put within the same floor which they did. Each room also comes with a cellphone with unlimited internet access and international phone call. So our group was able to communicate using this. The aircon in one of the 3 rooms where we should be staying was not working and this is the only bad thing about the experience. The maintenance told us that he will inform the front desk so we can change our room, we waited for almost 3 hours and no one calls. So we went to the front

title: Great place
desc: Central place to be. trains underneath, great for Santoasa island or to see a show, or f1 if the time is right, great food at good prices, we felt safe there even at night. great staff. Will go back again.

title: Clean & Convenient
desc: This was our second stay at the Lavender and we love the location, easy to catch a train and travel to any destination in Singapore. The bus is also at the doorstep but we didn't use this service. The hotel is clean and our room was very comfortable. The staff are very friendly and we would definitely recommend staying at the Lavender. We will definitely come back.

title: Best Value for money hotel in Singapore
desc: The location of this hotel is perfect for access to the MRT from either the Airport or the cruise terminal. The Lavendar Station is directly below the hotel . The MRT is easy to use to get anywhere in the city. The hotel rooms meet all our requirements and the staff are friendly and helpful. Free wifi and a nice swimming pool to cool off after a long day shopping. We have stayed at this hotel several times now and our friends also book regularly.

title: Superb...
desc: Beautiful city view from the hotel. Nice rooms, comfertable for family. I like it. Good service... It was a wonderful experience highlight quality service and friendly environment feels us happy. Decently you can opt this hotel for stay at Singapore. Perfect deals, and good restaurant, swimming pools.

title: Ween end gate away
desc: Fast check in and check out. So happy when Mr. Jason Teo gave me free up grade to premier room. The room is nice, not too small. Very near to Lavender MRT station and have so many foodstall surround. Absolutely will stay at V hotel Lavender if visit Singapore.

title: Visit
desc: Good Hotel .. Thanks Jason Teo for helping me in early check in free of Cost . Looking forward visiting V soon :) Thankyou . But Please restore soon as the Noise was very annoying during stay but hope overall a good experience .

title: Superb service and location
desc: Booked a room for my parents for 2 days. They were served by Kerwin who's friendly and accomodating. Location is very accessible and super close to MRT and city centre. Highly recommended to all visitors.

title: V hotel lavander
desc: Much happy since they allowed to check in early. this check in mangger is so good. thank you.i am much happy with the service of this hotel, specially this checkin guy who helped me. I was much tired and early checked in made me easy

title: Mr
desc: Appreciate the good reception at the hotel. Work done within no time They accommodated for early check-in Thanks ZHEN ZHOU & Jason I had a good time chatting with them, convenient, near to MRT Thanks once again

title: General manager
desc: Very good service by Zhen Zhou. Good location and just beside the MRT. Nice property and convenient for all areas. Nice food outlets around the area. Well experience staff and very friendly. For a holiday or business travelers good location to select.

title: Singapore tour celebration
desc: On our first day i made a call to ask if they have a birthday cake because its our friend's birthday and we wanted to surprise her,he said no they dont have. Then 1 min after, the staff told me he will try his best to send us free cake. i was impressed to the staff named JOVAN. He did everything for us to give us a birthday cake request for free!!!üéÇ Great service!!!üòä

title: Awesome hotel
desc: Good ambience and friendly surrounding. Hotel near to subway station. Mr Hanif front office supervisor help us alot with the tourist attractions places. He helps us alot with our stay here. Recommended and will come again soon.

title: Good service
desc: Tho hotel renovating but the service from the hotel staff zhen Zhou and his manager Jason was so nice and friendly to us upon our arrival they help us with our queries and assist us to a smooth check in

title: Awesome staff
desc: Awesome staff by v hotel lavender! I was warmly greeted by the repctionist zhen zhou and assistant manager Jason! They are so professional in their services! Would book this hotel again! 4star hotel with 5 star services! Do compliment them v hotel

title: Wonderful hotel
desc: Excellent service staffs by front office Jovan and manager Jason are very cooperative.wish to come again. Best hotel in Singapore. view from the room is awesome.near by to shopping centers.very cleanly maintained.Breakfast was awesome. Over all nice place

title: Best hotel
desc: Hotel good. The hotel is convenient,which is near the mrt station. I have been served by aloysius and Jason with a smile. Great stuff you have in the hotel. I will stay in this hotel next time I come.

title: Overall is good
desc: We walked in to the hotel for the stay. Jason Teo and Zhen Zhou served us friendly. They offered a free upgrade to us. The room was sparkling clean with stunning city views. Recommended and definitely will come back for future travels.

title: Best Hotel
desc: Very good customer service by front office staff Mohan and assistant manager Jason teo, clean rooms very curious friendly was very helpful to guide us for our shopping,will recommend yo our friends from india to check in this property .

title: Great Hotel
desc: Excellent hotel,Great location just above lavender train station, good staff,room is small but manageable.Room is clean everyday,cheers,food courts and eatery just outside the hotel,listen to the customer and especially jason teo helped us a lot.

title: Great host
desc: I would like to praise reception Zhen Zhou and the assistant manager Jason Teo, they serve me well and was very patient with me and my family. This is the first time I encounter such friendly staff in Singapore. I would certainly book this hotel again next time

title: Good View Room Nice place
desc: I‚Äôm on high floor nice view in night time and very easy to access from MRT and go to another place even if raining. Room clean not big but not too small for me it good hotel with nice facility and nice staff

title: Ok for what you pay
desc: Firstly good location in Singapore. It has been noted the rooms are small and that was the case. No problems for us but if you like space then this is probably not the hotel for you. There was a pretty awful smell on level 8 at times and we couldn‚Äôt work out what it was. Also the air-con is freezing. We actually had to turn it off to warm ip the room!! If you are after a hotel where they bring your bags up and down from the room this wasn‚Äôt our experience, however didn‚Äôt bother us personally. The tour booking guy is fantastic by the way. Lots of local knowledge and very helpful. Definitely saved us by being scammed from a taxi driver. Overall we don‚Äôt have a lot of complaints and is very handy for transport and the pool immaculate.

title: Good Location, Friendly Helpful Staff
desc: Hotel transfer from Changi Airport was easy and quick (SGD 9p/p including luggage). Very early arrival brought us to the hotel many hours in advance of check in time. Staff were very gracious and allowed us to occupy the room immediately which was very much appreciated. After a noisy start due to renovations, staff graciously and without question changed our room to a higher floor (again very much appreciated). First room was a little basic with older fixtures and fittings, older bed linen and towels however we were on a Singapore Air stopover for $1.00 per person per night so absolutely no complaint about the standard of room. The room change resulted in a superior room which, although not particularly large, was extremely comfortable, spotlessly clean and had a fabulous

title: Awesome hotel
desc: Amazing hotel very near to burger king and lavender mrt station. Nice room... Great hospitality by Mr. Hanif.... Room is very spacious................ Will come again soon and recommend my friends to v hotel lavender

title: Family Trip
desc: The Hotel was very nice, ; The staff (especially Kevis Toh) was very good. newly renovated with swimming pool including gym. Very convenient Hotel.... Check in was smooth... This is a must staying hotel ....

title: Nice and Beautiful Hotel
desc: I have checked in at V Hotel Lavender and I must say that the staff are warmly welcomed and the they were very approachable. The room were neat and tidy, and they do have complimentary coffee and tea bag. If you are bored, you can switch the TV channel to YouTube app and watch your favorite movies. V Hotel Lavender is a best place to check in as it is very near to the town area or I should say the well known area like Bugis, Orchard and many more. Thank you so much for the accommodation and the hospitality that you have given to me.

title: V hotel
desc: Firstly is it V hotel or lavender hotel or both. The room given was small dark and dingy. Nothing like the pictures on website . Then there is the gym nothing like pictures online so it‚Äôs has 5 pieces of equipment and no air con so like being in a prison cell I can imagine. The moment another guest walks in forget the workout. If you want an iron you have to share with all the other guests really. Breakfast was ok on plastic plates and plastic glasses a bit like a 5 year birthday party . One good thing about hotel the underground station is close .

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Nice hotel, staff is good and helpful , rooms are little smaller, all other facilities are good, location at the top of lavender MRT, very covinient, Breakfast options was not as per 4 star hotel, needs improvement, also indian food needs improvement for test, options of indian food was limited , i think the chef is south indian of Singapore because authentic indian test was missing. Near to little india and Bugis area, our hotel was very satisfied , we stayed from 5th to 10th june.

title: Prithvi Gusain
desc: Location of the hotel is excellent. Nice welcome by DHARNI AND MAO on front office and helped me in all manners. My son was sick and they gave us early check in. Hotel is neat and clean I‚Äôll definitely suggest others to stay here.

title: good service and always consider the customer
desc: I always book this hotel, not only the room is clean,fresh and professional,the best choice to stay with V hotel Lanvender, but also the trafic is great which is beside MRT station.Specially, there is food center around, so that you can choose your favourite food.

title: Overpriced
desc: We weren't particularly impressed with V Hotel Lavender. For over $700 AUD our rooms were very small, although we had a city view. Shower cubicles are very small and the height and angle of the shower rose can't be adjusted, but they are hot with good pressure. Not enough soaps. TV viewing is limited with only one Fox Movie channel which keeps cycling the same movies. However, the staff are awesome at the reception desk, porters and cleaning staff. Nearby is a great arcade full of food vendors as well as McDonalds and Burger King which is good to save money on dining. An MRT station is directly below the hotel and it is well positioned for walking tours of the city. There is nowhere to chill and have a drink after a long day.

title: location
desc: great location, very clean with helpful staff. Great food shops nearby, buses and train station close by. would stay again, we were able to to access our room prior to our booked in time, was able to get extra coffee and milk also

title: Location best, small rooms
desc: I like the location of the hotel which sits directly on top of MRT station Lavender. Room is small but comfortable enough for us. The staffs are helpful and polite to us when we needed information. Swimming pool is good and overall a good stay in Singapore

title: All is excellent
desc: My family and I were happy to stay at V-lavender hotel as all the staff is nice,polite especially Ms.Adriana that welcoming us well. The room is clean and excellent location for MRT access.I'll be back to this hotel when I'm travelling to Singapore.

title: Probably one of the worst stays in 15 years of travel
desc: Here is a quick list of pros and cons. Pros: - Proximity to metro station lavender - basically 30 steps away from the hotel door and ideal if you are traveling to or from the airport - mostly escalator and smooth surfaces all the way - ideal to transport your luggage - Big windows, so a view of the city on higher floors - The wifi works pretty well - Relatively private swimming pool (though hygiene questionable) Cons: - From an ecological point of view one of the worst practices I've seen - they throw away your bar of soap every single day and give you a new one in its pack. Please stop this! I wanted to write a note so they would stop it as it irritated and upset me each of the 2 afternoons. I would love it if the management will take a look at this. - Very small

title: Terrible service
desc: Bellman or doorman never help with the guest luggage. Every staff they never smile. Unfriendly. Rude. I thing this is typical Singaporean. Breakfast bad. Bathroom door was not working. But location was good.

title: Terrible hospitality!
desc: I don't think the staff at V Hotel Lavender knows to smile or greet a guest at the hotel. The waiters at the restaurant were very proud and had no courtesy towards us. The breakfast served in the morning was the same old menu for the five days we stayed at the hotel. There were no pool attendants at the pool to get pool towels after a swim. The rooms weren't cleaned on time everyday, had to call the reception about thrice before they came to get it cleaned everyday. Taking my whole Singapore tour, I think the only bad experience I had was staying at this hotel. It was a horrific experience.

desc: Excellent location: V hotel is right above the Lavender MRT and is accessible from all the tourist destinations. It‚Äôs on the same MRT line as of Changi Airport which makes it very easy to access from Airport. Food: Hotel has its own restaurant and room service too which has some veg food options. There are many cafes and restaurants in the vicinity. There are few super markets and convenience stores near the hotel which is very good for buying itsy bitsy things. Shopping: well connected form major shopping destinations via bus and MRT, Bugis area is very near, we went there by walking. title: Very small room
desc: Very small room and bathroom No shut off in toilet They toned 50 dollars for spilling coffee in the pillow If you are travelling with children better avoid this hotel. Pros Closeby ma by restaurants and MRT

title: Hotel
desc: First time at this hotel and it was good , right above the MRT which was so easy to get to where we wanted to go Food hall down below hotel which was also great , but you can get to anywhere reasonably quickly and cheaply if you want to go further - such a great city

title: Gooooodddddd
desc: This is the fourth time for us to stay in V Lavender hotel when we went to SG. For sure, the staffs are very friendly and helpful, the location is very easy to reach. The room are really good, they gave us a beautiful city view. Thankyou for having us!

title: Mr Rohit Save
desc: It‚Äôs been fantastic to be in the V hotel here inn Singapore, we had a lovely time. The staff is very friendly. Specifically big thanks to my friend and our dead duty manager Mr Teo. the location of the hotel is very strategic and well connected. Near by to most of the attractions like gardens and the Santosa.

title: Basic Overnight Hotel
desc: This was a bit of a disappointment. Located above Lavender MRT station, the room was so small, but very clean. Also no bar in the hotel and only basic restaurants (e.g. Maccas, Burger King and a few small takeaways) in the vicinity. If you want to be near some action then this is not the place, unless you use the MRT or taxi.

title: Satisfied Improvements
desc: I have stayed with this hotel many times since 2016. Convenient location and clean room. In the past months, there were some upgrading works carried out. My greatest satisfaction is the improved WiFi connectivity. Glad to see a new seating area in the reception lobby and no more unsightly luggage racks near to the lift lobby. The hotel management has done a good job to improve and upkeep the hotel.

title: Our stay in Singapore
desc: Last week we spent 3 nights in the V Lavender Hotel in Singapore. This Hotel was booked for us by Cruise 1st in a package deal. We couldn‚Äôt have been happier with the choice. My husband who is nearly 80 was not well when we arrived in Singapore after a 14 day cruise. When we required at Reception and asked whether we could have an early check-in they were very obliging and let us in for no cost. The same happened at checkout when they gave us a late check-out. The Hotel was very nice and clean and the staff were always friendly and helpful. I would recommend this Hotel to stay.

title: V hotelLavender
desc: We stay here for 3 days 2 night. The location is perfect as it's very closed to Lavender MRT. We can easily get the food from the foodcourt under the hotel. The staff are helpful and friendly to advice us abt the stay especially Mr. Kerwin. Only room is a bit too small for 3people but it's clean comfy and we feel safe staying here for the 3 ladies.

title: ok
desc: This was and OK place, Room was clean and tidy but a very small bathroom. Great situation right on top of the MRT station, the staff were polite. But, the breakfast didn't have lots of western selection, and the dining menu didn't have lots of variety. Don't go here if you like cocktails.. cause they don't serve them at all . !! The pool is in between two buildings so doesn't see much sun at all, hence the waters pretty cold . Make sure you check your room has breakfast added on to it. Plenty of children on our floor!!

title: Great place to stay!!
desc: The staff is very helpful, hotel located in very good location near mrt very convenient!!!! It is also near little India!! We are glad to stay at this hotel and we recommend all to come over thanks!!!!

title: Lovely hotel
desc: Was a lovely stay! Very well located hotel. Jovan served us well at the check in. Good location located near the train station with very beautiful view will definitely come back again if I'm coming back to singaoore

title: V Lavender never disapointed
desc: Thank you so much for Zhen zhou (guess service) in the check in counter. He really helpful and so nice to us when check in to the hotel. And for sure will always back to here for stay when in Singapore.

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: This is really nice hotel to stay when you are in Singapore. The hotel staff Jovan is so helpful and having an excellent service. Room are very neat and clean. I feel so comfortable here during my stays, as I am regularly visit to Singapore for my business trip and I always prefer this hotel.

title: Amazing visit to vlavender
desc: Mr shiyong was that person who tried every possible effort to not to get ruined my vacation.. He was the best amongst all.. Nd the stay over v lavender is total 10/10 The room service is 10/10........

title: Very Nice Hotel With Good Price.
desc: V Hotel Lavendar is a very nice place to stay @ Singapore with Family. MRT station is very nearby. Mac, Burger King and Subway is just near. Their staff, Michelle @ Reception is very kind and good.They have provided me eaely check in @ just 9 AM. Rooms are good with neat and clean environment.Most importantly they have a view from the room.With the price this one is best.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Very good hospitality and courteous front desk Staff. Well appreciated. The room is newly renovated and nicely done up. The location very strategic, many restaurant around, The transportation to this hotel very easy, under the hotel is MRT Lavender Station

title: My stay
desc: Was greeted very well as soon as I entered. Granted late check out and room upgrade, both complimentary because of availability and request!!! Very happy to stay here will recommend people to come here!!

title: High points for transport & food convenience
desc: I stayed for a couple of nights and it was at a fantastic location. Tons of food around, Mcdonald's, burger king, hawker stall, bubble tea, convenience store, money changer all 30 seconds from the main door. Lavender MRT is right underneath it. The room itself its basic and clean. Air con was ok. Had a good sleep on the bed. Be careful of the shower though, the water can get burning hot. Start off at the cold end first then turn to hot. Would definitely come back.

title: Hotel near city center
desc: Location is good above lavender mrt station and ton of food stall or fastfood outlet just in the corner or around the hotel Just 10 min walking to Bugis junction area where you can many cheap food court or souvenir shop to find Room is small but clean a full amenity

title: Excellent Location, Good Facilities
desc: Extremely well situated by Lavender MRT. Comfortable rooms regularly attended to. Some have said rooms are on the small side but was a good size for me. Poolside and dining area very nice and relaxing

title: Would not stay
desc: Taking the convenience of location and transport this hotel was picked. Not again for the service, the room quality and the price especially having to stay for a week. The first room was warm at 5 degs C and the kettle did not stop boiling. After repeated requested was allocated another room on a upper level which was no better. Must be my bad luck as the kettle was not working, the room temp at 35 deg was freezing. Found a crockache in the bathroom, and the whole room has this horrible musky smell, ceilings were stained. Spoke to the reception who said that they will do something about it. A week has passed! So many ground staff but no personal attention. A very busy hotel and will not pick this one in future for sure.

title: Nice Hotels and Near to Everywhere
desc: Hi All, This was first time to book our stay in Singapore at V Hotel Lavender. why we decided to take this hotel is its location near to our most-frequently-visited places in Singapore. also, hotel resides not so far fro public transportation such as MRT and bus stop. If you usually take MRT from Changi Airport, then after Tanah Merah you will ride on green line and alight at Lavender station. And, we also got recommendations from our family who ever stayed there. family is someone who knows exactly what you need. and what I need is Food :) you can find a lot of food besides V Hotel Lavender. there are food court like in hawker center, not very much, but enough to choose from chicken rice, Chinese food, seafood, indian food, and so on. there are also nasi lemak canteen which

title: Average hotel
desc: The location is the only thing for this hotel. The rooms are really small. specially when you and your partner are tall.. An MRT station is directly below the hotel and it is well positioned for walking tours of the city. The breakfast menu is rarely changing and was good just for Indians or locals and Chinese . I stayed 4 days at this hotel but they didn't have for example boiled egg in the menu for a day......

title: Nice Hotel to stay with family.
desc: Location is best suited to stay in singapore.From Taxi (available close to hotel lobby every few min )to MRT (Lavender station is metro at hotel basement ). Travelling with family was never trouble due to its location nd available modes of transportation. breakfast was nice. Swimming pool is not available for children. Rooms are as usually small in singapore better go for triple room if with family.

title: Conveniently located above MRT Lavender
desc: We stayed at V hotel for two nights. Best part of the hotel was its location. Singapore MRT covers almost every corner of the city. So staying above Lavender station was a huge plus. We could roam around the city pretty easily, including in and out of Changi. Upon arrival we had to stand in a queue and wait for our turn. Front desk officer was alright!! We booked triple room with one queen and a single bed. While checkin I was briefed about handy :) This device was an ultimate convenience. Room was alright, not enough space for three but it was okay in terms of Singapore standards. Bathroom was clean but was very small and compact. Breakfast was average, could have been better. Overall experience was alright so no complain. A 4star for its location.

title: Business travel cum solo trip experience
desc: Amazing location. Commute from the airport is convenient. Helpful staff who allowed quick check in The location is closer to various sights in singapore which makes travel convenient and time saving worth visiting

title: Satisfied!
desc: Super satisfied with the service&staff, especially Mr. Kerwin that kindly welcome us with his warm heart. Also it‚Äôs super strategic location above the lavender mrt & surround by the food. Thankyou V Hotel!

title: Small smelly room
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights first impression when we walked into the room was omg this is so small Then the smell hit me Very mouldy smell probably due to lack of fresh air as there was no window that could be opened Walked into bathroom that to was very small Toilet paper was identical to facial tissues and also doubled as hand towels as know hand towel was supplied Spoke to house keeping regarding the smell and Handed a can of air freshener Minimal tea and coffee satchels Wasn‚Äôt impressed

title: Singapore trip
desc: Verry Nice & Comfortable , easy access to airport , public transport & many restaurant , this hotel are good for busines trip & holiday , the staff are warm & friendly , they can speak english , malay & chinese as well

title: Staying at V hotel Lavender
desc: I cant count how many times i‚Äôv been staying at this hotel, everytime i visit singapore i always stay here. The hotel staffs are very nice and kind, room is very clean and tidy, the housekeeping also very nice and helpfull. Location is perfect just 10 seconds walk from Lavender MRT its just next to the MRT. Always satisfy staying here - elga, from Indonesia -

title: Location is good with fair price
desc: I rated V Hotel a four due to its location and fair price. Singapore has a spectrum of hotels from hostels, air bnb, to six star luxury. We lived in Singapore and had the opportunity to stay at many places. Friends of ours visiting stayed at the V Hotel and recommended it. Now that we live elsewhere in Asia, we return to Singapore to see friends. The V Hotel is off the MRT green line and is a central location to meet friends. The room we had was immaculate, quiet, and comfortable. The MRT is left of the lobby...so convenient! Eateries are all around. The blue downtown line at Bugis is one stop away and the red line at City Hall is two stops. Staff at the V Hotel are kind and helpful. They have an airport shuttle for six SGD. It is likely we will stay here again for

title: Nice experience
desc: Located very strategically just above Lavender MRT. The check- in was hassle free , staffs were very professional and friendly.The rooms were very neatly maintained and room service was very good . The room was slightly on the smaller side yet in totality it was nice experience for us.

title: Excellent customer service
desc: Hotel V Lavender is an awesome hotel. Mrt is walking distance. Excellant Service rendered by Mr.Kevis. Registration was smooth. I recommend V Hotel Lavender. Rooms are cosy and comfortable. They had handy devices and Wifi was services for the residence to feel at home. :)

title: Super convenient super friendly
desc: We choose V Hotel Lavender because it is very convenient on top of Lavender MRT station and we had a great stay at the hotel. The staffs there are super friendly and helpful and the rooms clean and comfortable. It feels great staying here!!

title: Hotel review
desc: Having a really pleasant stay here. Nice staff Nice ambiance Nice rooms All good. Will miss this city and hotel Looking forward to come again Well behaved persons. . . Served by-kerwin At the reception And he was too good in treating us

title: Slightly upgraded budget hotel
desc: We went to this hotel for a conference because it was one of the recommended hotels. It is near a MRT station that helps you around the city easily. Check in was smooth and they even allowed us to check in early. The rooms though are small and have barely any moving space. The Toilet and bath is even smaller, I had very little moving space inside the shower. Breakfast had Halal and none halal options but nothing spectacular but enough options to fill you up for the first part of your day. Over all the hotel is a good place to stay in if you just want to come in and out and travel around the city.

title: Great service
desc: The hotel is clean and the service is excellent. Hotel is near to MRT and near to find food. Easy to find taxi also. The hotel price is very good. The breakfast also very good food. Just try, I always stay here.

title: Great location!
desc: Amazing experience travelling from the Changi airport via the MRT - it only took 20 minutes to reach the hotel, which is around the corner from the station. Everyone I came across made me feel special, they even let me check-in early at 9pm instead of 2pm, which was a great relief after an overnight flight from Dubai. P.S. There are loads of great restaurants in the vicinity and the area is really well-connected.

title: Great Location stay in mid budget
desc: Its a good hotel, location is plus point as nearest MRT is Lavender just 100 meters away. Apart from that this hotel gives you a Mobile phone with local SIM a good addon. Rooms are clean with big windows and excellent views. But yes rooms are a bit smaller. I will suggest this hotel because of value for money and its great location. Mustafa mall is almost 1.5 Km away, so you can walk or use MRT (Lavender to Ferrar Park) in both cases you will be walking same. I found reception guys a little less polite as compare to other hotels I stayed in Singapore. They need to sound a bit more polite. These guys behaves like a old Government official. Apart from that hotel is really good.

title: Good hotel
desc: Wonderful and fantastic experience. Location is beautiful with all the facilities near by. Hotel staff is brilliant ,caring and supporting to all our needs. Recommend to everyone traveling to Singapore..

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Lovely room, lovely staff ,the receptionist called Kevin is very helpful and accommodating , they really try to make your holiday special. The hotel is clean and really suitable for tourist. Would happily recommended.

title: The easiest access in Singapore and beautiful city view
desc: I am staying in v lavender hotel during 2 days with my husband as honeymoon trip. And I love this hotel so much due to easy access to MRT, just going into basement and we already arrived in lavender MRT Station. title: Excellent stay
desc: We had an amazing stay, the staff were very courteous with a good, clean and prompt service. The food variety was also ambient. Good and classy ambience with a convenient location right next to the hub stop

title: Exemplary customer service
desc: Their hotel concierge, Theo, was overly helpful in assisting and helping organize the stay of our large group in their hotel. Going above and beyond to ensure our comfort and ease in assigning all the rooms; checking us earlier than scheduled and always with a smile! Will surely return to V Hotel on our next visit to Singapore. Special thank you again to Theo for everything that he has done for us!

title: Best location n very reasonable prices
desc: I am from Singapore but staying in another country due to my job. I found this hotel have the best location as it very very near to MRT station, foods are easily available at the same area. It is directly access to the airport through the MRT station... I never fail to stay in this hotel whenever I am back in Singapore for couples days. Highly recommendation. However, a important pointe to note was, you need to book early as it is always full :)

title: Excellent
desc: Very convenience as just located right next to the mrt station and surrounded by lots of restaurants and convenience stores! The staff are very friendly and polite. Definitely worth every penny that you had spent.

title: A nice hotel
desc: Great location, below is a mrt station, a lot of food choices nearby and a money changer besides the hotel is also very handy. The room was nice but could be a bit smelly at times, but not in a way that its disturbing (we just have sensitive noses, i guess). Overall it was a good experience :-)

title: Best hotel
desc: Best hotel In Singapore in center location near all MTR & market. Staff is very good coprative Mr Hanif help to checkin very coprative give all information that help me reach my work locations my next trip In Singapore with fmaily in same hotel

title: Comfortable hotel that is located at the cbd
desc: I have been served by Dharani. She was so kind and nice and she has upgraded my room as I was staying for 1N in Singapore. And, this hotel is so convenient to travel around CBD. Thank you for the stay. I enjoyed it.

title: Good location
desc: Stayed 7 nights during my trip to Singapore for convention. The hotel is in a good location located above MRT Station Lavender. Very convinient to many attractions and many choices of food nearby. However, the room is small and abit smelly.

title: Cheap Hotel in Heart of Singapore
desc: In our search for cheaper accomodation in Singapore I came across the V Hotel in Lavender. This hotel is a very nice hotel with very accomodating staff. We arrived just after midnight and was very pleasantly surprised to see the front desk was manned by 4 staff who were very efficient in the check in process - so easy.. We tried the onsite restaurant - which we found a little on the pricy side but really can not fault the quality, presentation or the staff. For a cheaper option - or Singaporean experience there is a variety of food eateries in the kitchener complex across the road or around the corner from the hotel (turn left outside door). We tried a variety of local dishes for $6 - $8, there is a subway and burger king in the complex as well. Those looking for a grocery

title: Nice Location!
desc: Good hotel with nice location. Around 15 minutes walk to Bugis Street and Little India. Rooms are rather small but front desk staff is very polite and efficient. Special thanks to Mr. Mao at front desk for early check in and putting our 5 rooms on same floor. He was also very helpful in providing information about nearby areas.

title: Well managed hotel
desc: The staff at the hotel were extremely helpful, friendly & courteous. The location is brilliant. Room was tidy & clean. within 10 metres of the hotel there were food courts which included a variety of different foods. Underneath the hotel is the MRT station which on several occasions we used to get to other locations, trains running every few minutes. We even used the station to get to Changi Airport to travel home, it was simple and the cost was $2.60, so much cheaper & easier than getting a Taxi.

title: Nice hotel strategic location
desc: Been stay at this hotel couple times when visit singapore. I love this hotel cos the location up stair lavender mrt station and many food place around hotel like mcd, toast box, burger king etc. the room clean, not too small for 2 person, shower is narrow but im okay with that, not too busy also i like stay at this hotel. Very recommended for single or 2 traveller. I think this hotel is indonesian fav hotel for staying at singapore üòÅ

title: V Hotel Lavender
desc: This is the second time I come to Singapore. I chose to stay here because the hotel is near the MRT, convenient transportation and most importantly, I am very impressed with the service of this place.

title: V Hotel Lavender
desc: I have visited Singapore at least 3 times a year, certainly I stay at V Hotel Lavender.This is a nice place with convenience.The location is near MRT that I can go everywhere easily. The most important thing is the fully service mind staff.I've already booked this hotel for mynext trip on 13-15 December.

title: Average 3.5 star hotel
desc: Front desk staff are efficient and helpful. Rooms are adequate and have the basic requirements. Bathroom is very small and the shower is really only big enough for a small adult, you have to be a contortionist to reach the toilet paper. Plenty of hawker shops nearby for food but no decent bars anywhere for a quiet ale or two. If you are a tourist I'd avoid this place as its not near to anything interesting, if you are on business then it's OK if your office is nearby.

title: An utter shamb;es
desc: Hotel V Lavender was a huge disappointment, the photos of the property on the web look nice enough but the stay is grim. This is a bed factory and in no way does it represent that of a true four star hotel. The room was compact but to be fair the floor area was advertised. The shower room suitable for Lilliputian people only. Breakfast had a total lack of order and was more akin to feeding time at the zoo, certainly not relaxed. The housekeeping chose to leave their trolley out in the corridor overnight (3 nights) which in the event of mass evacuation being required would provide a chokepoint, suspect building inspector might have something to say of this practice. The best feature of the hotel was its location being adjacent to the Lavender MRT station.

title: Average at best.
desc: The location is the only thing this place has going for it. It is way overpriced, but that is Singapore I guess. The lobby is overpowered with some disinfectant smell which makes you feel ill. Reception staff were rude, not once did someone smile or make eye contact with us at check in. The lifts are slow and always overpacked. Rooms are tiny and the bathrooms are even smaller. Hot water is inconsistent. No hand towels, hairdryers, irons available in rooms. You are forced to walk out into a car park to iron your clothes.

title: Fabulous
desc: Arrived by taxi, front doorman attended immediately to unload suitcases onto trolley while we checked in. Suitcases brought to our room promptly after we had opened our room to settle in. Location excellent - MRT station very close. Staff extremely friendly. Paid for breakfast - amazing buffet selection. Room very quiet (we were on 6th floor). Did not have opportunity to use pool or gym as we only stayed one night. Checkout was smooth, with secure suitcase storage availability. We will definitely stay here again, for a longer period, and would recommend this hotel.

title: Very convenient location
desc: Very convenient location it is very near to mrt lavender. We stay here for the first time and everything is well and good for us.. the people are kind and helpful to us. Rhe room has a big window and has very good view.

You can‚Äôt come from your floor to other floors because your key card - it is also a lift card only allow you can come exactly to your floor. If you travel with your family, it will be very inconvenient. If you want to come to other floor, you must walk or come to lobby. then your friends, your family must come to lobby to pick up you. The price is too expensive, room is too small, it‚Äôs not correspond with 4 stars standard.

title: Hotel Lavender
desc: Good hotel at MRT Lavender the people here are friendly and helpful. There is many staffs at the reception and it is very busy hotel. The receptionist are friendly and helpful always smiling. The room is small, and bed for me is a bit too soft.

title: AWESOMENESS
desc: It was our first family overseas trip. Thankfully we booked V hotel, coz it's easy to find, only 5 mins walk from Lavender station and it's surrounded by food! desc: I booked directly through the hotel's website so they avoid having to pay hefty commissions through an online travel agent. Sometimes hotels are thankful by giving you a good room. Not the V Hotel Lavender. I booked the entry level standard room. I was given a room right next to the elevator. Very noisy as people come and go until late at night and the floor does not have carpet there. Also the window looks directly at a wall. The next day I asked whether there was another standard room but was told they are all right next to the elevator. So just be aware of that as the walls / doors are thin. Apart from that the hotel is fine. Perfect location. Rooms are nicely furnished.

title: Good service hotel
desc: Very good hospitality and clean room,good environment.happy to be served by Teo Yu Ming who is very helpful to our needs as it is our first time in Singapore. We will recommend to our friends to stay here the next time

title: The best and afforable hotel in singapore

title: Enjoyable stay

The room was spacious enough clean and lovely, the air condition work great, the bed was very comfortable which gave us a fantastic nights sleep to recharge energy after the whole day activity. The bathroom is clean with hot water working well. The breakfast was good with enough choices. title: Great Location, Decent Hotel, Good Staff

Moreover, the metro station and the bus stop are right there- just a minute' walk away! The hotel staff is friendly. A nice, clean and affordable place. Our flight arrived early morning and the hotel staff was happy to check us in at around 10 am. Then, we had mistakenly booked a twin bedroom instead of a double bedroom. Hotel staff heard us and arranged for a double bedroom within a few minutes. Super happy with their services! The rooms were cleaned every day and no disturbance at night.

title: Returned visit
desc: This was not my first time here. Our stay was very good, room was clean, kettle with tea and coffee, fridge, English speaking channels, make up mirror, free toiletries, even toothbrushes, nice comfortable bedding. The only weird thing was the shower. It's fixed to it sprays the opposite wall and one would have to be a gnome to be able to use it when it's fixed to the wall. You have to remove it and hold it yourself to be able to wash yourself.

title: Great Location and Great room!
desc: The trip we had was splendid! For non-picky people, this hotel is already an awesome one. We stayed in the Superior Twin with City View. It was so nice and quiet! We were also allowed to do early check-in without extra cost! I will definitely book again when I get back and although the hotel is not that economical, you will surely love it because it's surrounded by a lot of food stalls, grocery store and also the MRT is just under it.

title: Nice hotel, convenient location

The room was nice and clean, with a lovely view over the Merdeka Bridge. The bathroom was clean as well, with soap, shower gel and toothbrushes provided. We arrived early on the day of our check-in but the receptionist let us know the room was ready and we were able to check in early. On the day of our departure, we were also able to get later check-out by two hours at no extra charge, which was useful. I would definitely recommend this as a convenient city hotel with great transport links.

title: Very happy with the hotel's services

He also helped us to get a taxi to go to the airport and assisted to load our luggage into the boot of the taxi.

title: Awesome service

Had an argument with one of the room boy when they did not cleaned our room when we were out. Gave unreasonable excuses which made me pissed off. Please monitor and teach your staff to be respectful to the customers. The positive part is this hotel is located above a row of various food stalls and restaurants. They even have McDonalds and Burger King nearby. You wont be hungry when staying here.

title: Anderson rocks!
desc: Anderson was awesome and very helpful! He really made our entire experience much better, he helped us whenever he could, he provided great recommendations, and he was super friendly. He is an amazing help!

title: Excellent location
desc: Located right at the Lavender MRT station it is a perfect location from the airport straight down a single line on the MRT. The hotel was excellent, the room quite small but was still most suitable. The staff were efficient and friendly and the room was relatively cheap. The bed was comfortable and quiet and we slept well. We had a city view room, but hardly spent any time in the room anyway. Food outlets and restaurants are right outside and access to the rest of the MRT system was perfect. Wifi was free and fast.

title: Never again at V Hotel Lavender
desc: Hotel probably designed according to Murphy's law. Aircon thermostat does not work, room extraordinarily small, bathroom shower cannot be adjusted and good only for tall people, cupboard placed on wrong side, sitting ledge only place to keep luggage and if you keep luggage there then you cannot open cupboard. Room like a matchbox and bathroom like a matchstick. They charge SGD 200+ for this room!!!!. This was the worst room I have stayed in Singapore in my 25 years of travel. Please disregard all the room photos on the net.

title: Amazing V
desc: Had booked the hotel for 3 nights. The location is great of the property, had a metro station, bus stop and a wide range of food outlets in 1-2 min walking. The hotel staff was very courteous. The food and services were also great. The breakfast spread was good and the ala carte menu was also very good and had great options. Highlights recommended to stay here if travelling to Singapore.

title: Splendid convenient Location! Super Customer care from Ho Wee Meng, Evelyn and the team
desc: Wonderfully located with an underground train station, a food court, money changing services, supermarkets all within the same building. The hotel is also very close to major shopping spots in town. The hotel staff attend to their guests with a personal touch. I appreciate Evelyn at reception and Hoo Wee Meng the janitor for their help particularly when I had to switch rooms. I was initially next to a laundry or office with the laundry carts crammed outside my door. The rooms are small and the executive room comes with out a view. The two rooms I occupied were kept particularly cold. The rooms were cleaned very well but often soap and linen replacement was incomplete.

Special mention to Mr. Ho Wee Meng for an excellebt customer service.

Mr. Henry & Mr. Wee Meng were so helpful, friendly and informative to explain about the hotel facilities, and place to visit surrounding. And also Ms. Nurul at the front desk, she is very welcome and genuinely friendly. - Not too mention this hotel location is second to none!

title: Highly Recommended, Great Location and Excellent Services

Very Grateful to Aloysius/Cecilia, Excellent Service and God Bless you. We will definitely stay at this hotel again when we visit Singapore.

title: Will def come back again!
desc: We had a very nice and comfortable experience at the V Hotel. It is very accessible to public transportation such as the MRT and bus. There is also a food center and a couple of fast food restaurant right at the ground floor. The place is clean and the hotel staff are helpful and friendly. Bonus is our welcoming receptionist is a Filipina! Ms Cecilia was very accommodating and offered assistance such as a extended check out time. There is also a drinking water refilling station so we were able to save a few bucks on water. We highly recommend this place to those coming to SG.
